channel.title: Brandon Boswell
channel.description: Recent content from Brandon Boswell's Digital Garden

item.title: Move forward with decisions that are easily adjusted later
item.description: Significant time is lost over-discussing choices that can be easily adjusted later. If it can be changed painlessly later, choose what appears to be a decent option and revisit this in a retrospective where you’ll have more information.
item.content:encoded: Significant time is lost over-discussing choices that can be easily adjusted later. If it can be changed painlessly later, choose what appears to be a decent option and revisit this in a retrospective where you’ll have more information.
